item.title: 日元走软突破 155 关键点位，干预风险增加
item.description: 日元汇率三十多年来首次跌破 1 美元兑 155 日元的水平，加剧了这一关键水平可能促使日本财务省介入市场的风险。【原文：The yen weakened beyond 155 per dollar for the first time in more than three decades, fueling risk that the key level may prompt Japan’s Ministry of Finance to step into the market.】

item.title: 德雅尔丹集团计划出售 Fiera，控制权成疑
item.description: 加拿大基金管理公司 Fiera Capital Corp. 的最大股东之一希望退出，这让人怀疑公司董事长兼首席执行官让-吉-德雅尔丹（Jean-Guy Desjardins）能否继续控制公司。【原文：One the largest shareholders in Canadian fund manager Fiera Capital Corp. wants out, raising questions about whether Chairman and Chief Executive Officer Jean-Guy Desjardins will be able to keep control of the firm.】

item.title: 欧洲天然气贸易商已开始担心下一个冬季
item.description: 在欧洲天然气市场创纪录的价格波动中沉寂了一年多之后，交易商们又开始焦躁不安了。【原文：After more than a year’s respite from record price swings in Europe’s natural gas market, traders are getting agitated again.】

item.title: 冰岛通胀率降至 2022 年以来最低水平
item.description: 冰岛的通货膨胀率降至两年多来最慢，这表明冰岛中央银行更有可能在未来几个月内开始降低西欧的最高利率。【原文：Iceland’s inflation eased to the slowest pace in more than two years, suggesting its central bank is more likely to begin reducing the western Europe’s highest interest rate in the coming months.】

item.title: 大众将推出新的电动车子品牌，吸引挑剔的中国买家
item.description: 大众汽车公司将在中国开始销售一个新的电动汽车品牌，该品牌将配备车载头像等小玩意儿，以帮助其赢回被比亚迪（BYD）等公司甩掉的年轻买家。【原文：Volkswagen AG will start sales of a new electric-vehicle brand in China kitted out with gadgets like an in-car avatar to help win back young buyers it has lost to the likes of BYD Co.】

item.title: 科塔克被禁止增加在线客户和发行信用卡
item.description: 印度市值排名第四的科塔克-马恒达银行有限公司（Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd. ）在监管机构指出其技术系统存在治理和风险问题后，被禁止通过数字渠道增加新客户和发行新信用卡。【原文：Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd., India’s fourth-largest lender by market value, has been barred from adding new customers through its digital channels and from issuing fresh credit cards after the regulator flagged governance and risk issues about its technology systems.】

item.title: Prada 和 Miu Miu 从中国获得推动力，而竞争对手 Gucci 则举步维艰
item.description: 普拉达公司（Prada SpA）的销售额跃升，这家同时拥有 Miu Miu 的意大利时尚集团继续超越其最大的竞争对手。【原文：Prada SpA’s sales jumped as the Italian fashion group, which also owns Miu Miu, continues to outperform its biggest rivals.】

item.title: 可可价格波动是 20 世纪 70 年代以来最疯狂的一次
item.description: 可可在纽约恢复了涨势，在历史性紧缩的不确定性以及交易商撤出市场的情况下，可可价格出现了近五十年来最剧烈的波动。【原文：Cocoa resumed gains in New York, with prices the most volatile in almost five decades amid uncertainty over a historic crunch and as traders pull out of the market.】

item.title: 俄罗斯推动其最大私人银行在国内迁址
item.description: 俄罗斯开始采取行动，通过寻求暂停其在国外注册的股东的所有权，迫使该国最大的私人银行重新注册。【原文：Russia began moves to compel the country’s largest private bank to redomicile by seeking to suspend the ownership rights of its foreign-registered shareholders.】

item.title: 雪佛龙与埃克森的对决取决于增长野心
item.description:
达伦-伍兹（Darren Woods）的石油巨头市值领先 1780 亿美元，而这一切都归功于低成本生产。【原文：

Darren Woods’ oil titan has opened up a market-value lead of $178 billion, and it’s all down to low-cost production.

】

item.title: 施罗德首席执行官彼得-哈里森即将退休，寻找继任者
item.description: 施罗德公司（Schroders Plc）首席执行官彼得-哈里森（Peter Harrison）计划于 2025 年卸任，这家基金管理公司即将开始寻找继任者。【原文：Schroders Plc Chief Executive Officer Peter Harrison is planning to step down in 2025 and the money manager is soon set to kick off a search for his successor.】

item.title: 美国 30 年期抵押贷款利率升至 7.24% 的五个月高点
item.description: 美国抵押贷款利率升至五个月来的最高水平，导致购房申请在过去六周内第五次下降。【原文：US mortgage rates increased to the highest level in five months, pushing down home-purchase applications for the fifth time in the last six weeks.】

item.title: PZ Cussons 在尼日利亚销售额骤降后可能撤离非洲
item.description: PZ Cussons Plc 对其非洲业务进行了审查，有可能从其成立的地区转向投资剩余业务和偿还债务。【原文：PZ Cussons Plc put its Africa business under review, potentially pivoting away from the region in which it was founded to invest in its remaining business and pay down debt.】

item.title: 土耳其的 "正统 "立场使里拉成为汇丰银行的最爱
item.description: 土耳其货币政策回归常规，增强了投资者的信心，为资本流入创造了条件，也支撑了汇丰控股有限公司对该国资产的看涨立场。【原文：Turkey’s return to a more conventional approach to monetary policy is boosting investor confidence, setting the stage for capital inflows and underpinning HSBC Holdings Plc’s bullish stance on the nation’s assets.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。特斯拉计划最快在今年推出廉价汽车，股价因此大涨；Meta 将公布财报；国债拍卖再创新高。索菲亚-奥尔塔-科斯塔（Sofia Horta e Costa）想收到本新闻通讯的西班牙语版本吗？注册获取 Five Things：西班牙语版时事通讯。【原文：Good morning. item.title: 瑞安航空首席执行官表示 "乐意 "提供卢旺达驱逐航班
item.description: 瑞安航空控股公司（Ryanair Holdings Plc）首席执行官迈克尔-奥利里（Michael O'Leary）对英国有争议的将难民驱逐到卢旺达的计划发表了看法，称如果他有可用的飞机，他会 "很乐意 "执行这些航班。【原文：Ryanair Holdings Plc Chief Executive Officer Michael O’Leary weighed into the UK’s controversial plan to deport refugees to Rwanda, saying he would “happily” do the flights if he had the available aircraft.】

item.title: 农作物贸易商抵御经济下滑，邦吉公司利润超预期
item.description: 农业综合企业巨头邦吉全球公司（Bunge Global SA）称，由于谷物价格下降和整个行业压榨利润率收紧，该公司第一季度盈利降幅低于预期。【原文：Bunge Global SA said first-quarter earnings fell less than expected as the agribusiness giant weathers a decline in grain prices and tighter crushing profit margins across the industry.】

item.title: 印尼加息可能不足以刺激印尼盾反弹
item.description: 分析师和策略师认为，印尼央行的加息可能有助于抑制印尼盾的短期疲软，但不足以刺激印尼盾反弹。【原文：Bank Indonesia’s interest-rate hike may help curb any short-term weakness in the rupiah but is not enough to spur a rally in the currency, according analysts and strategists.】

item.title: 国债需求强劲，销售再创新高
item.description: 本周三，美国国债市场又将面临一次重大考验，一场创纪录的国债拍卖将于本周三举行，而此前一天，一场 "令人印象深刻 "的两年期国债拍卖暗示，美国国债市场的抛售潮终于有所缓解。【原文：The US Treasury market faces another big test with a record bond auction on Wednesday, a day after an “impressive” two-year sale hinted the selloff is finally abating.】

item.title: CVC和Puig首次公开募股将检验欧洲IPO反弹的力度
item.description: 欧洲首次公开募股反弹的迹象开始逐渐显现，两家大公司的首次公开募股将决定未来的发展方向。【原文：Evidence of a rebound in Europe’s initial public offerings is starting to trickle in, with two big-ticket debuts set to determine the path ahead.】

item.title: 欧佩克向非洲石油勘探热点纳米比亚提供支持
item.description: 石油输出国组织承诺帮助纳米比亚成为重要的原油生产国，为这个南部非洲国家加入该卡特尔拓宽了道路。【原文：The Organization of Petroleum Exporting Countries pledged to help Namibia become a significant crude producer, widening a path for the southern African nation to join the cartel.】

item.title: 中国称欧盟医疗器械调查是向保护主义迈出的一步
item.description: 中国批评欧盟对医疗器械制造商的市场准入展开调查的决定，称此举试图打压中国公司。【原文：China criticized the European Union’s decision to launch a probe into market access for medical-device makers, saying the move is an attempt to suppress Chinese companies.】

item.title: 印度投票之际，莫迪加紧攻击反对党的福利计划
item.description: 印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）使用批评者认为在印度教多数派和穆斯林少数派之间制造分裂的语言，加倍抨击主要反对党。【原文：Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi doubled down on his attacks against the main opposition party by using language critics say sows division between the country’s Hindu majority and Muslim minority.】

item.title: 中国要求经纪商限制 "滚雪球 "式衍生品的风险敞口
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，在股市大跌之后，经纪商将收益率提高到接近创纪录的水平，以吸引投资者购买 "滚雪球 "式的衍生产品，中国正在采取行动遏制这种行为。【原文：China is moving to curb “snowball” derivatives after brokers hiked returns to near-record levels to attract investors to the risky products following a stock-market selloff, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 瑞安航空首席执行官敦促波音公司在危机期间继续保持领导力
item.description: 瑞安航空控股公司（Ryanair Holdings Plc）首席执行官迈克尔-奥利里（Michael O'Leary）表示，波音公司管理层在寻求稳定业务的过程中需要注重连续性，而商用飞机部门的新负责人已经有了一个良好的开端。【原文：Ryanair Holdings Plc Chief Executive Officer Michael O’Leary said Boeing Co. management needs to focus on continuity as it seeks to stabilise the business, and that the new head of the commercial aircraft unit has made a promising start.】

item.title: Investcorp 成立由中国中投公司支持的 10 亿美元中东基金
item.description: 中东最大的另类资产管理公司正在设立一个由北京主权财富基金支持的 10 亿美元投资工具，投资于波斯湾和中国的公司。【原文：The Middle East’s biggest alternative asset manager is setting up a $1 billion investment vehicle backed by Beijing’s sovereign wealth fund to invest in companies across the Persian Gulf and China.】

item.title: StanChart 提醒渴望石油和铜的客户警惕通货膨胀
item.description: 渣打银行（Standard Chartered Plc）的一些客户越来越青睐铜和石油等有形资产，考虑到美国利率可能会继续走高，英国银行的首席策略师对这种做法感到担忧。【原文：Some Standard Chartered Plc clients are increasingly favoring tangible assets like copper and oil, an approach that worries the UK bank’s chief strategist given the possibility that US interest rates might have higher to go.】

item.title: 瑞银集团主席表示严重关注资本改革
item.description: 瑞银集团主席科尔姆-凯莱赫（Colm Kelleher）说，瑞士政府要求瑞银大幅增加资本的建议，是对一年多前导致瑞士信贷倒闭的失误的 "错误补救"。【原文：UBS Chairman Colm Kelleher said that the Swiss government’s proposal to require the bank to hold substantially more capital is the “wrong remedy” to the failings that brought down Credit Suisse over a year ago.】

item.title: BCG 今年净招聘 2,000 人，不惧咨询业低迷
item.description: 波士顿咨询公司（Boston Consulting Group）今年将增加 2000 多名员工，以应对行业增长放缓带来的最大公司裁员潮。【原文：Boston Consulting Group is set to grow by more than 2,000 employees this year, defying an industry slowdown that’s seen the biggest firms slash jobs.】

item.title: 随着经济复苏，德国商业前景创一年新高
